当然.translation: natural, as a matter of course

休める.translation: give a rest, set at ease

見合い.translation: meeting with a view to marriage

内心.translation: back of one's mind, one's real intention

待ち遠しい.translation: just can't wait for, long for

生かす.translation: take advantage of, make use of

一切.translation: not at all, not one bit

取り次ぐ.translation: relay a message, transfer a call

親しむ.translation: get close to, get familiar with

こたつ.translation: kotatsu, heated table with a coverlet

取材.translation: collection of data, gathering of news

わざわざ.translation: go to a lot of trouble

立て替える.translation: pay for another, pay in advance

逃げ出す.translation: make a break for, run off

両立.translation: managing two things, having it both ways

到底.translation: after all, in the long run

もてる.translation: be popular with the opposite sex
